project_descr: Reduce GHG emissions from fossil fuel-based power generation in Barbados by strengthen the country’s Disaster Risk Response (DRR) while promoting a decentralized solar photo-voltaic electricity generation

outputs.output_descr: Promotion of increased access to clean energy  in Barbados through solar photo-voltaic systems in government buildings to strengthen the country’s climate resilience and disaster risk management

document_name: 91628 DREAM Project ProDoc Final as at July 30 2015
Disaster Risk and Energy Access Management

project_title: disaster risk and energy access management
